comment.author: 27217020@N00
comment._content: Looks like there's a date of 2/22/13 written on the back of this photo, which would mean it was taken a few days before Woodrow Wilson's inauguration on March 3, 1913.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: slack13:  Thanks for catching the date.  We will update the information and reload the description.

comment.author: 34515493@N02
comment._content: Some photos appear to be part of a series numbered 2646-1 thru at least 2646-15. Lincoln's pew is 2646-10, Inaug platform -11, Capitol showing platform -12, Stand in front of Treasury -13, Pres'l viewing stand -15. Several of these are dated 2/22/13, as noted by others. Oddly, 2646-1 thru 2646-6 are dated later, 5/3/13. These include Suffragette parade-1, Madge Udall -5, Inez Holland -6. The numbering system evidently is not chronological--probably thematic.
